component.name: getRelationship
component.description: Show org chart relationships. Defaults to user_current, supports user_id

component.name: deleteRelationship
component.description: Remove the relationship specified by relationship_type from the user specified by the numeric string ID

component.name: addRelationship
component.description: Add an org chart relationship. Specify id of the user for whom the relationship is being added as user_id, if the user is not the current user. Use [ subordinate | superior | colleague ] to create the relationship
